mapper.select: SELECT fno,poster,name,rownum FROM (SELECT fno,poster,name FROM food_house WHERE type LIKE '%'||#{type}||'%' ORDER BY fno ASC) WHERE rownum<=50
SELECT rday FROM food_house WHERE fno=#{fno}
SELECT time FROM reserve_day WHERE rno=#{rno}
SELECT time FROM reserve_time WHERE tno=#{tno}
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(Max(no)+1,1) as no FROM reserve
INSERT INTO reserve(no,id,fno,rday,rtime,inwon) VALUES(#{no},#{id},#{fno},#{rday},#{rtime},#{inwon})
mapper.select: SELECT no,rday,rtime,inwon,ischeck,regdate, (SELECT name FROM food_house WHERE fno=reserve.fno) as name, (SELECT poster FROM food_house WHERE fno=reserve.fno) as poster, (SELECT address FROM food_house WHERE fno=reserve.fno) as address, (SELECT tel FROM food_house WHERE fno=reserve.fno) as tel, (SELECT type FROM food_house WHERE fno=reserve.fno) as type FROM reserve WHERE id=#{id} ORDER BY no DESC

SELECT no,rday,rtime,inwon,ischeck,regdate,id, (SELECT name FROM food_house WHERE fno=reserve.fno) as name, (SELECT poster FROM food_house WHERE fno=reserve.fno) as poster, (SELECT address FROM food_house WHERE fno=reserve.fno) as address, (SELECT tel FROM food_house WHERE fno=reserve.fno) as tel, (SELECT type FROM food_house WHERE fno=reserve.fno) as type FROM reserve ORDER BY no DESC

SELECT no,rday,rtime,inwon,ischeck,TO_CHAR(regdate,'YYYY"년도" MM"월" DD"일" HH24:MI:SS') as dbday, (SELECT name FROM food_house WHERE fno=reserve.fno) as name, (SELECT poster FROM food_house WHERE fno=reserve.fno) as poster, (SELECT address FROM food_house WHERE fno=reserve.fno) as address, (SELECT tel FROM food_house WHERE fno=reserve.fno) as tel, (SELECT type FROM food_house WHERE fno=reserve.fno) as type FROM reserve WHERE no=#{no}
